messages.subject: Caren/ Re: Christmas
messages.msgSnippet: ... Thank you, I like Caren with a C! My parents were hippies, but my name is actually my middle name roughly translated from a native Black Foot Indian
messages.messageBody:
>Wildflower (love your name! it makes me happy to write it),

Thank you, I like Caren with a C! My parents were hippies, but my name is
actually my middle name roughly translated from a native Black Foot Indian
language. My dad's family has always called me by that, he is 1/4 Blackfoot.
My mothers family has never called me by that name, they call me Melissa, my
middle name. I use both interchangeably. This year I got a letter from the
Department of Defense saying I HAD to use my legal name on all documents, so
I am using WIldflower more these days. It also makes me easier to identify
on yahoo groups!

>have you
>read "Unplug the Christmas Machine"?

Your the second person to recommend that book. I'm looking into finding it,
I may break down and buy it.

Wildflower
